comment: This is a professor who is willing to give accommodations to students. He checks in with the class weekly to tell what assignments are due in a timely manner. This professor does not grade harshly unless you do not turn in assignments.
The compassion and dedication he brought to his students is nothing but extraordinary. Well done Dr. D.
He is a great teacher and a consummate pro. Extremely kind and understanding. He does whatever he can to help his students. Take anything he teaches, you won't regret it.

Take this professor. Very respectful and willing to answer questions. This classs assignments are super long and tedious but what we found out as a class is that no matter what you submit you get a 100 so dont bother doing them. Thats the same with the group project to. Everyone gets the same comment on the submission and everyone gets a 100
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Group projects

comment: Professor Dawit is an excellent instructor. Really knows his stuff. He is extremely helpful and very timely in his response. He is really experienced and wise professor, would definitely recommend taking a course with him.
My favorite professor. he is one of the very few professors who know what they are teaching. I would absolutely take any of the classes that he offers.
Excellent teacher, I would definitely take his other courses. Highly recommended.
